snippet: Ohio officials said that an oil and gas well near the site of two small earthquakes was undergoing hydraulic fracturing, or fracking, when the quakes occurred.
abstract: Ohio officials say oil and gas well near site of two small earthquakes was undergoing hydraulic fracturing, or fracking, when the quakes occurred.
lead_paragraph: Ohio officials said that an oil and gas well near the site of two small earthquakes was undergoing hydraulic fracturing, or fracking, when the quakes occurred.

headline.main: Ohio Looks at Whether Fracking Led to 2 Quakes
headline.print_headline: Ohio Looks at Whether Fracking Led to 2 Quakes
